metadata.Title: CVE-2013-5588 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Cacti 0.8.8b andearlier allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via(1) the step parameter to install/index.php or (2) the id parameter tocacti/host.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-5588` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5').
